title: These look like prizewinning photos. They’re AI fakes.
description: As rapid advances in AI image generation tools make automated images ever harder to distinguish from real ones, experts say their proliferation on sites such as Adobe Stock and Shutterstock threatens to become a major problem.

title: OpenAI and X: Promises of populist technology, shaped by a single man
description: In the end, power in Silicon Valley is largely held by a small cadre of believers and loyalists who deliberate in secrecy and answer to no one.
